name: part_002
file: tmp_【冒頭無料配信】Midnight Grand Orchestra 1st LIVE「Midnight Mission」 [UeHcGTNlLvY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A static waiting screen for the live concert 'Midnight Mission' is shown, accompanied by an instrumental medley of the group's music. The screen displays the event title, the official hashtag, and stream participation rules.
The scene transitions to the live concert venue. The lights dim, and the audience begins cheering and clapping in anticipation of the performance's start.

subtitles.original: Midnight Grand Orchestra 1ST LIVE Midnight Mission
subtitles.english: Midnight Grand Orchestra 1ST LIVE Midnight Mission

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The performance will begin shortly. Please wait a moment.
